Text:

dude go to My documents and go to fifa 13 then delete ur previous squad then open this file and copy squads0 to fifa 13 --->launch fifa 13 go to my fifa in game menu then to fifa 13 and load squads then select ur downloaded squad enjoy it :)
Well i followed all the steps and loaded this file, but when i try to play friendly match or kick off fifa quits.
For custom squads to work on the career mode, start a new career mode game and choose squad as "customized" from the settings when it pops.
